com.amplifyframework.datastore.storage.sqlite

Class SQLiteStorageAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.amplifyframework.datastore.storage.sqlite.SQLiteStorageAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LocalStorageAdapter

    public final class SQLiteStorageAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
implements LocalStorageAdapter
    An implementation of LocalStorageAdapter using SQLiteDatabase.

    • Method Detail

      • forModels

        public static SQLiteStorageAdapter forModels(ModelSchemaRegistry modelSchemaRegistry,
                                             ModelProvider userModelsProvider)
        Gets a SQLiteStorageAdapter that can be initialized to use the provided models.
        Parameters:
        modelSchemaRegistry - Registry of schema for all models in the system
        userModelsProvider - A provider of models that will be represented in SQL
        Returns:
        A SQLiteStorageAdapter that will host the provided models in SQL tables

      • initialize

        public void initialize(android.content.Context context,
                       Consumer<java.util.List<ModelSchema>> onSuccess,
                       Consumer<DataStoreException> onError)
        Initialize the storage engine s.t. it will be able to host models of the provided types. A ModelSchema will be generated for each Model provided by the ModelProvider. This method must be called before any other method on the LocalStorageAdapter may be used. Only models that have been provided at initialization time are "in-play" for use with the LocalStorageAdapter. It is a user error to try to save/query/delete any model type that has not been initialized by this call.
        Specified by:
        initialize in interface LocalStorageAdapter
        Parameters:
        context - An Android Context
        onSuccess - A callback to be invoked upon completion of the initialization
        onError - A callback to be invoked upon initialization error

      • save

        public <T extends Model> void save(T item,
                                   StorageItemChange.Initiator initiator,
                                   QueryPredicate predicate,
                                   Consumer<StorageItemChange<T>> onSuccess,
                                   Consumer<DataStoreException> onError)
        Save an item into local storage only if the data being overwritten meets the specific conditions. A Consumer will be invoked when the save operation is completed, to notify the caller of success or failure.
        Specified by:
        save in interface LocalStorageAdapter
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of the item being stored
        Parameters:
        item - the item to save into the repository
        initiator - An identification of the actor who initiated this save
        predicate - Predicate condition for conditional write
        onSuccess - A callback that will be invoked if the save succeeds
        onError - A callback that will be invoked if the save fails with an error

        Query the storage for items of a given type.
        Specified by:
        query in interface LocalStorageAdapter
        Type Parameters:
        T - Type type of the items that are being queried
        Parameters:
        itemClass - Items that have this class will be solicited
        onSuccess - A callback that will be invoked if the query succeeds
        onError - A callback that will be invoked if the query fails with an error

                                     StorageItemChange.Initiator initiator,
                                     QueryPredicate predicate,
                                     Consumer<StorageItemChange<T>> onSuccess,
                                     Consumer<DataStoreException> onError)
        Deletes an item from storage only if the data being deleted meets the specific conditions. A Consumer will be invoked when the save operation is completed, to notify the caller of success or failure.
        Specified by:
        delete in interface LocalStorageAdapter
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of item being deleted
        Parameters:

        initiator - An identification of the actor who initiated this deletion
        predicate - Predicate condition for conditional delete

        onError - A callback that will be invoked when deletion fails with an error

      • observe

        public Cancelable observe(Consumer<StorageItemChange<? extends Model>> onItemChanged,
                          Consumer<DataStoreException> onObservationError,
                          Action onObservationComplete)
        Observe all changes to that occur to any/all objects in the storage.
        Specified by:
        observe in interface LocalStorageAdapter
        Parameters:
        onItemChanged - Receives a StorageItemChange notification every time any object managed by the storage adapter is changed in any way.
        onObservationError - Invoked if the observation terminates do an unrecoverable error
        onObservationComplete - Invoked it the observation terminates gracefully, perhaps due to cancellation
        Returns:
        A Cancelable with which this observation may be terminated

      • terminate

        public void terminate()
               throws DataStoreException
        Terminate use of the local storage. This should release all resources used by the implementation.
        Specified by:
        terminate in interface LocalStorageAdapter
        Throws:
        DataStoreException - if something goes wrong during terminate

      • clear

        public void clear(Action onComplete,
                  Consumer<DataStoreException> onError)
        Each implementation of this adapter interface will have its own interpretation of what clear means. The intent is to destroy any DataStore-related artifacts and reset the adapter such that it is usable by the DataStore plugin.
        Specified by:
        clear in interface LocalStorageAdapter
        Parameters:
        onComplete - Invoked if the call is successful.
        onError - Invoked if an exception occurs.
